marcomorosi06/WiFiAudioStreaming-Desktop

Streams audio between devices over a local network

View on index

Related repos

  • Transcribes audio streams in real-time
  • Streams audio from Jellyfin servers to mobile devices
  • Transmits video and audio streams through Streamlit via WebRTC
  • Distributes audio from radio recorders to browsers
  • SDK for Airplay, Miracast, and GoogleCast protocols
  • desktop app for fast audio transcription with Whisper, supports batch files, live mode, Windows and macOS
  • Self-hosted soundboard for Discord
  • Generates binaural audio from video and text
  • Single file audio playback and capture library
  • AudioCraft: code for generating music, sound effects, and audio compression from raw audio and textinputs
